page.title: 15Daily Lives
page.content: Nothing stirs in our house until the time 6.30; this marks the beginning of the day for my dad. After getting washed and dressed he wakes me at 7.00 approx. and I get washed and dressed. This is followed by breakfast then we evacuate the house at 8.00, on our way to his working day and my normal school day. My mum doesn't commute till 9.30 in the morning, so 7.30 is still quite early for her, but just the same she gets up. Nan, the only person left, has the whole morning to herself, while mum's at work. So for her, there's no rush for her to get up. My dad drives a couple of school friends, and me into West Byfleet, and carries on to work; from West Byfleet we walk to school at about 8.15.
